topic.title: PK's Wing Bites
topic.shortdesc: PK's wing bites are my FAVORITE food in Blacksburg! Combined with their homemade ranch and a side of fries this app can be turned into one, big, delicious meal!

image.alt: Image of PK's wing bites and a drink.

body.p: PK's offers a range of flavors from mild to hot. I have tried all three, with my personal favorite being hot (don't be afraid of the heat!) They are served with carrots and celery as well as toothpicks so you can easily pick up a bite without getting sauce everywhere! Pro tip: ask for extra ranch!
